<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returned by the comparison functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> ResultPred = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legalizeactions/#a834a0e3032e20fe88a0c931e8f246654a1e5ed9cc15d3744694855efcdf0b948e">Libcall</a>.Predicate;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ResultPred == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba07aee43ffb66908a25c55c77ce4c0d05">CmpInst::BAD&#95;ICMP&#95;PREDICATE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have a nice 0 or 1, and we just need to truncate it back to 1 bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to keep the types consistent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MIRBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#abf1763199cd36c9253c6f062fa5e973e">buildTrunc</a>(ProcessedResult, LibcallResult);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to compare against 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#ad8c2100cae3093d71e65a48908158e22">CmpInst::isIntPredicate</a>(ResultPred) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unsupported predicate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Zero = MIRBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#af751c28a69e1d07e19dad11e4e26a70d">buildConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a67021459c7ef8f9a634b4eac7ffd0f96">LLT::scalar</a>(32), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MIRBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a3a618c7b84d45b5e188f6a7e4305ee39">buildICmp</a>(ResultPred, ProcessedResult, LibcallResult, Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
